lead_paragraph: The Masters will say goodbye to another former champion this week when Tom Watson makes a final trek up the 18th fairway, but not before he marks the occasion by leaving one last egg salad sandwich by the 13th tee.

headline.print_headline: Watson to Exit Masters With Tradition of His Own
headline.main: Watson to Exit Masters With Tradition of His Own
